property.note: Product assessed but no known hazards or warnings applicable. May be applied to both digital and physical products. Only for use in ONIX 3.0 or later
Required on applicable products sold in the US

name.language: WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD – Small parts | Not for children under 3 yrs.

property.note: Required on applicable products sold in the US

name.language: WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD – Children under 8 yrs. can choke or suffocate on uninflated or broken balloons. Adult supervision required | Keep uninflated balloons from children. Discard broken balloons at once.

property.note: Required on applicable products sold in the US

name.language: WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD – This toy is a small ball | Not for children under 3 yrs.

property.note: Required on applicable products sold in the US

name.language: WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD – Toy contains a small ball | Not for children under 3 yrs.

property.note: Required on applicable products sold in the US

name.language: WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD – This toy is a marble | Not for children under 3 yrs.

property.note: Required on applicable products sold in the US

name.language: WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD – Toy contains a marble | Not for children under 3 yrs.

property.note: To be used when a supplier wishes to make a clear statement that no such warning is applicable to product
Required on applicable products sold in the US

name.language: WARNING: STRANGULATION HAZARD – Long cord | Not for children under 3 yrs.

property.note: To be used when a supplier wishes to make a clear statement that no such warning is applicable to product

Required on applicable products sold in the US. Should be accompanied by additional text: Swallowed magnets can stick together across intestines causing serious infections and death. Seek immediate medical attention if magnet(s) are swallowed or inhaled

name.language: WARNING: MAGNET HAZARD – Product contains (a) small magnet(s)

property.note: To be used when a supplier wishes to make a clear statement that no such warning is applicable to product
Product flashes, flickers or includes high-contrast static or moving patterns which may cause discomfort or seizures in people with photosensitive epilepsy
To be used when a supplier wishes to make a clear statement that no such warning is applicable to product
Product makes loud, sudden, repetitive or other sounds which may trigger seizures in sensitive people
To be used when a supplier wishes to make a clear statement that no such warning is applicable to product
Products simulates (via visual effects) the experience of motion, which may cause nausea in sensitive people
To be used when a supplier wishes to make a clear statement that no such warning is applicable to product

name.language: No motion simulation hazard warning necessary

property.note: Required on applicable products sold in California. Must be accompanied in <ProductFormFeatureDescription> by specific additional text as displayed on product or packaging. For example, “WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including [chemical name], which is known to the State of California to cause cancer. For more information, go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov”. Note long-form warnings should be used here, even if a short form warning is used on the product or packaging

name.language: WARNING – California Proposition 65 carcinogenic, teratogenic or other reproductively harmful chemical hazard

property.note: To be used when a supplier wishes to make a clear statement that no such warning is applicable to product

name.language: No California Proposition 65 hazard warning necessary

property.note: <ProductFormFeatureDescripton> carries the name of chemical that is the subject of a warning, taken from the list at www.p65warnings.ca.gov/chemicals
Flashing present but risk unknown or unassessed
Sound present but risk unknown or unassessed
Motion simulation present but risk unknown or unassessed
